Frequently Logged Questions

Do synthetic papers produce valid signals?

Signals from synthetic stock are classed as echoes and carry 0.4x predictive weight unless paired with hardwood proximity evidence.

Is this accepted by major underwriting firms?

Yes. Seven insurers now accept ADSI reports for workplace preparedness rebates and corridor hazard planning.

Can minors enroll in the registry?

Minors may be listed under supervised household plans; direct interpretation privileges begin at age 16.

How often is the ledger refreshed?

Core telemetry refreshes every second. Formal summaries lock at 00:00 UTC for archival certainty.
